mapper.select: select * from INSHQuoteinfo where id = #{id} and fairyoredi = #{fairyoredi} and nodecode = #{nodecode}
delete from INSHQuoteinfo where id = #{id} and fairyoredi = #{fairyoredi} and nodecode = #{nodecode}

update INSHQuoteinfo set operator = #{operator},modifytime = #{modifytime},noti = #{noti},quotetotalinfoid = #{quotetotalinfoid},ownername = #{ownername},platenumber = #{platenumber},quoteinfo = #{quoteinfo},quoteresult = #{quoteresult},quoteamount = #{quoteamount},discountrate = #{discountrate},inscomcode = #{inscomcode},insprovincecode = #{insprovincecode},insprovincename = #{insprovincename},inscitycode = #{inscitycode},inscityname = #{inscityname},insureway = #{insureway},taskstatus = #{taskstatus},workflowinstanceid = #{workflowinstanceid},deptcode = #{deptcode},agreementid = #{agreementid},quotediscountamount = #{quotediscountamount},buybusitype = #{buybusitype},fairyoredi = #{fairyoredi},nodecode = #{nodecode} where id = #{id} and fairyoredi = #{fairyoredi} and nodecode = #{nodecode}
